component.description: PickList is used for transferring data between two different collections.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Value of the component.

attribute.name: converter
attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.

attribute.name: immediate
attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: Marks component as required.

attribute.name: validator
attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validationg the input.

attribute.name: valueChangeListener
attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.

attribute.name: requiredMessage
attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.

attribute.name: converterMessage
attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.

attribute.name: validatorMessage
attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Name of the iterator.

attribute.name: itemLabel
attribute.description: Label of an item.

attribute.name: itemValue
attribute.description: Value of an item.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style of the main container.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container.

attribute.name: disabled
attribute.description: Disables the component.

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: Name of the animation to display. Default is fade.

attribute.name: effectSpeed
attribute.description: Speed of the animation. Default is fast.

attribute.name: addLabel
attribute.description: Text of add button. Default is "Add".

attribute.name: addAllLabel
attribute.description: Text of add all button. Default is "Add All".

attribute.name: removeLabel
attribute.description: Text of remove button. Default is "Remove".

attribute.name: removeAllLabel
attribute.description: Text of remove all button. Default is "Remove All".

attribute.name: moveUpLabel
attribute.description: Text of move up button. Default is "Move Up".

attribute.name: moveTopLabel
attribute.description: Text of move top button. Default is "Move Top".

attribute.name: moveDownLabel
attribute.description: Text of move down button. Default is "Move Down".

attribute.name: moveBottomLabel
attribute.description: Text of move bottom button. Default is "Move Down".

attribute.name: showSourceControls
attribute.description: Specifies visibility of reorder buttons of sourcelist. Default is false.

attribute.name: showTargetControls
attribute.description: Specifies visibility of reorder buttons of target list. Default is false.

attribute.name: onTransfer
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an item is transferred from one list to another.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.

attribute.name: itemDisabled
attribute.description: Specifies if an item can be picked or not.

attribute.name: showSourceFilter
attribute.description: Displays an input filter for source list.

attribute.name: showTargetFilter
attribute.description: Displays an input filter for target list.

attribute.name: filterMatchMode
attribute.description: Match mode for filtering, valid values are startsWith (default), contains, endsWith and custom.

attribute.name: filterFunction
attribute.description: Client side function to use in custom filterMatchMode.

attribute.name: showCheckbox
attribute.description: When true, a checkbox is displayed next to each item.

attribute.name: labelDisplay
attribute.description: Defines how the button labels displayed, valid values are "tooltip" (default) and "inline".
